definitions: an American freshwater catfish with four pairs of barbels around the mouth.

notes.text: Family Ictaluridae: several genera and numerous species, including the black bullhead (Ameiurus melas)

shortDefinitions: American freshwater catfish with four pairs of barbels around mouth

definitions: a small, mainly freshwater Eurasian fish of the sculpin family, with a broad flattened head and spiny fins.

notes.text: Genera Cottus and Taurulus, family Cottidae: three species

shortDefinitions: small, mainly freshwater Eurasian fish of sculpin family, with broad flattened head and spiny fins

definitions: a North American water lily with globular yellow flowers.
shortDefinitions: North American water lily with globular yellow flowers
